about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Goremon, where Goremons are the power source of this world. In this adventure game, you will be able to collect and train Goremons to use them in epic battles against other trainers. You will discover that each Goremon has unique abilities and characteristics, and you will have to explore a world full of mysteries and dangers, where you will have to solve puzzles and face challenges to advance in the story.

A story in which you decide

In Goremon, you will have to make difficult decisions that will affect the course of the story. In addition, there are different factions that seek to control the power of the Goremons, including the Church, the Scientists and the Pro-Animals. Each faction has its own perspective on the use of the Goremons, but you won't have to choose sides, as you can explore the story at your own pace.

The world has a life of its own, interact with the different characters, swap goremons, and change the course of their stories.

The game's graphics are intense and vibrant, and the music will immerse you in a world full of excitement and action. Are you ready to delve into the world of Goremon and discover the secrets behind the power of the Goremons? Begin your adventure!

Tactical turn-based battles

Fight to be the first ranked in your Region's Federation!
  • You decide who is worthy to join your ranks. You can use up to 6 Goremons per battle.
  • Fight in battles with a speed system, which will determine how many attacks you can make per turn.
  • Your own system of altered states to create strategies.
  • You can advance at your own pace. You decide whether to fight outside the stadiums or in official competitions.

Characteristics

  • Capture the more than 100 types of Goremons available.
  • Level up and evolve your team.
  • Play indistinctly with controller and keyboard.
